title: Horrible Mac Client
body: Loading screen after finishing a game takes 1 MINUTE to load. This issue is on a MAC CLIENT. Very frustrating, i want to revert back to my old client, please fix this.

replies.body: Additionally, make sure you have Low Spec Mode enabled!

Hey there,

do you have the "close client during game" option checked in the client? Try disabling this option and let me know if that helps.
